ing.item: Uncooked bacon; cut into small pieces

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 400Ã¸. Partially slice the bread into 16 pieces. Cut each slice of cheese diagonally and place one triangle of cheese in between each piece of bread. Place the bread on a foil covered cookie sheet. Combine margarine, onion, mustard and poppy seeds and mix well. "Ice" the bread on top and sides. Place small pieces of bacon on top. Bake for 20 minutes and serve hot. Yield: 6 to 8 servings.
ANN LEEK (MRS. STEPHEN A.)
